summary: Project includes Step 1 Internet Identity login flow deployed (Version 41). Step 2 will implement seller onboarding in phases: first an onboarding step-by-step wizard structure, then business/identity verification, then store profile form.
architectural_notes: Seller onboarding implementation order: (1) wizard structure, then (2) business/identity verification, then (3) store profile form.
known_issues: Draft app expired and required redeploy/rebuild to continue work.

existing_features.title: Add a new Seller Onboarding Wizard route and page that provides a step-by-step wizard framework (navigation, progress indicator, step list) with placeholder screens for each onboarding step, starting with the wizard structure itself (no full business verification or store profile forms yet).

Require authentication and completed basic user profile (existing Profile Setup flow) before allowing access to the Seller Onboarding Wizard; unauthenticated users should be prompted to log in, and authenticated users without a profile should be redirected to /profile-setup with a redirect back to the onboarding route.

Persist seller onboarding wizard progress (current step, completed steps, timestamps) so that refreshing the page or returning later restores the wizard to the last saved step; implement this with a backend API for the callerâ€™s onboarding state and a React Query hook on the frontend.

Define the initial onboarding steps in the wizard to match the upcoming implementation order: (1) Wizard Introduction/Overview, (2) Business + Identity Verification (placeholder), (3) Store Profile (placeholder), plus any additional placeholder steps needed to support future expansion (e.g., Storefront Template, Products) without implementing their detailed forms yet.
